name: Call of Deji - Modern idiot
description:
Campaign:

Save McDonald's from being blown up by Ksi, with the help of your dad and an AK47.

zombies:

Fight the undead in the epic call of deji zombies mode. Pick up over 8 different weapons from the mystery box and unlock new abilities.

Zombies maps included:

- Forest

- Sub-Zero

- Power

Players: 1

Version: 2.40

Platform: Windows 7,8,10

Website: www.callofdeji.weebly.com
